Name: Broll
About the game: Who cares about physics laws? None of us for sure! Broll (stand for BROken ragDOLL) is a platform game where you can jump high, run fast and stick at all sorts of things. As we say, the sky's the limit, join us on this incredible challenge and share with the community your best move. Challenges wait for you in this vast exploration journey. Try to reach the most unreachables places to unlock secrets and achievements. We hide lots of stuff for the ones who are ready to search the game in all directions. Explore 6 open levels Find all the save points to unlock new the next chapter Try to find all the hidden cosmetics to customize your dummy! Creat your own levels for broll and share them on the steam workshop! Create your own custom levels Publish them on the steam workshop Play unique levels created by the communnity Short levels, with a timer, try to dominate the leaderboard! 20 new short levels to play with. Once you completed a run your score is send to the steam leaderboard ! Do you think you know how to play Broll? Try this to be sure! Made for speedrun, expert mode is a timed version of Adventure mode! In expert mode you only have 25 seconds to get to the next save point! Play any level of the Adventure mode in expert Fight against your friends in the local multiplayer of broll! Currently there is only the Royal Rumble game mode, but more are coming soon! Royal Rumble : Fight agaisnt your friends, each save point make you win a point, and fall to lose one a simple and fun game mode to play with friends! We are working hard to make this game better. For that, we need your help, come on our official discord to share your ideas and report bugs! We have also exciting new features to announce that are coming soon: New content and game modes Broll online, a fully multiplayer broll experience! And more ...
